verses.verse: בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> Ye [are] the children אַתֶּ֔ם <WH859> you לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> your God לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תִתְגֹּֽדְד֗וּ <WH1413> ye shall not cut וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תָשִׂ֧ימוּ <WH7760> yourselves nor make קָרְחָ֛ה <WH7144> any baldness בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between עֵינֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5869> between your eyes לָמֵֽת׃ <WH4191> for the dead

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עַ֤ם <WH5971> people קָדוֹשׁ֙ <WH6918> For thou [art] an holy אַתָּ֔ה <WH859> you לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God וּבְךָ֞ בָּחַ֣ר <WH977> hath chosen יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> and the LORD לִֽהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become לוֹ֙ לְעַ֣ם <WH5971> people סְגֻלָּ֔ה <WH5459> thee to be a peculiar מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> of all הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> unto himself above all the nations אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> are on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> that [are] upon הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> the earth ס
לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תֹאכַ֖ל <WH398> Thou shalt not eat כָּל־ <WH3605> any תּוֹעֵבָֽה׃ <WH8441> any abominable thing

זֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> These [are] the beasts אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תֹּאכֵ֑לוּ <WH398> which ye shall eat שׁ֕וֹר <WH7794> the ox שֵׂ֥ה <WH7716> lesser כְשָׂבִ֖ים <WH3775> lamb וְשֵׂ֥ה <WH7716> lesser עִזִּֽים׃ <WH5795> and the goat

אַיָּ֥ל <WH354> The hart וּצְבִ֖י <WH6643> and the roebuck וְיַחְמ֑וּר <WH3180> and the fallow deer וְאַקּ֥וֹ <WH689> and the wild goat וְדִישֹׁ֖ן <WH1788> and the pygarg וּתְא֥וֹ <WH8377> and the wild ox וָזָֽמֶר׃ <WH2169> and the chamois

וְכָל־ <WH3605> Any בְּהֵמָ֞ה <WH929> And every beast מַפְרֶ֣סֶת <WH6536> that parteth פַּרְסָ֗ה <WH6541> the hoof וְשֹׁסַ֤עַת <WH8156> the cleft שֶׁ֙סַע֙ <WH8157> and cleaveth שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> into two פְרָס֔וֹת <WH6541> claws מַעֲלַ֥ת <WH5927> [and] cheweth גֵּרָ֖ה <WH1625> the cud בַּבְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> among the beasts אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> that ye shall eat

אַ֣ךְ <WH389> Nevertheless אֶת־ <WH853> זֶ֞ה <WH2088> of these לֹ֤א <WH3808> are not תֹֽאכְלוּ֙ <WH398> Nevertheless these ye shall not eat מִמַּֽעֲלֵ֣י <WH5927> of them that chew הַגֵּרָ֔ה <WH1625> the cud וּמִמַּפְרִיסֵ֥י <WH6536> or of them that divide הַפַּרְסָ֖ה <WH6541> hoof הַשְּׁסוּעָ֑ה <WH8156> the cloven אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַ֠גָּמָל <WH1581> [as] the camel וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאַרְנֶ֨בֶת <WH768> and the hare וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁפָ֜ן <WH8227> and the coney כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מַעֲלֵ֧ה <WH5927> for they chew גֵרָ֣ה <WH1625> the cud הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> like וּפַרְסָה֙ <WH6541> not the hoof לֹ֣א <WH3808> not הִפְרִ֔יסוּ <WH6536> but divide טְמֵאִ֥ים <WH2931> [therefore] they [are] unclean הֵ֖ם <WH1992> like לָכֶֽם׃

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַ֠חֲזִיר <WH2386> And the swine כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because מַפְרִ֨יס <WH6536> because it divideth פַּרְסָ֥ה <WH6541> the hoof הוּא֙ <WH1931> he וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor גֵרָ֔ה <WH1625> yet cheweth not the cud טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> it [is] unclean ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לָכֶ֑ם מִבְּשָׂרָם֙ <WH1320> of their flesh לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תֹאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> unto you ye shall not eat וּבְנִבְלָתָ֖ם <WH5038> their dead carcase לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תִגָּֽעוּ׃ <WH5060> nor touch ס

אֶת־ <WH853> זֶה֙ <WH2088> These תֹּֽאכְל֔וּ <WH398> These ye shall eat מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> of all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> of all that [are] in the waters כֹּ֧ל <WH3605> anything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֛וֹ סְנַפִּ֥יר <WH5579> all that have fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֖שֶׂת <WH7193> and scales תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> shall ye eat

וְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> anything אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> that אֵֽין־ <WH369> have ל֛וֹ סְנַפִּ֥יר <WH5579> And whatsoever hath not fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֖שֶׂת <WH7193> and scales לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תֹאכֵ֑לוּ <WH398> ye may not eat טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> it [is] unclean ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לָכֶֽם׃ ס
כָּל־ <WH3605> any צִפּ֥וֹר <WH6833> birds טְהֹרָ֖ה <WH2889> [Of] all clean תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> ye shall eat

וְזֶ֕ה <WH2088> these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תֹאכְל֖וּ <WH398> But these [are they] of which ye shall not eat מֵהֶ֑ם <WH1992> like הַנֶּ֥שֶׁר <WH5404> the eagle וְהַפֶּ֖רֶס <WH6538> and the ossifrage וְהָֽעָזְנִיָּֽה׃ <WH5822> and the ospray
וְהָרָאָה֙ <WH7201> And the glede וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אַיָּ֔ה <WH344> and the kite וְהַדַּיָּ֖ה <WH1772> and the vulture לְמִינָֽהּ׃ <WH4327> after his kind
וְאֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and every עֹרֵ֖ב <WH6158> And every raven לְמִינֽוֹ׃ <WH4327> after his kind

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> בַּ֣ת <WH1323> first הַֽיַּעֲנָ֔ה <WH3284> and the ostrich וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַתַּחְמָ֖ס <WH8464> and the night hawk וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁ֑חַף <WH7828> and the cuckow וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנֵּ֖ץ <WH5322> and the hawk לְמִינֵֽהוּ׃ <WH4327> after his kind
אֶת־ <WH853> הַכּ֥וֹס <WH3563> The little owl וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּנְשׁ֖וּף <WH3244> and the great owl וְהַתִּנְשָֽׁמֶת׃ <WH8580> and the swan
וְהַקָּאָ֥ת <WH6893> And the pelican וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> הָרָחָ֖מָה <WH7360> and the gier eagle וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁלָֽךְ׃ <WH7994> and the cormorant
וְהַ֣חֲסִידָ֔ה <WH2624> And the stork וְהָאֲנָפָ֖ה <WH601> and the heron לְמִינָ֑הּ <WH4327> after her kind וְהַדּוּכִיפַ֖ת <WH1744> and the lapwing וְהָעֲטַלֵּֽף׃ <WH5847> and the bat

וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> and all שֶׁ֣רֶץ <WH8318> And every creeping thing הָע֔וֹף <WH5775> that flieth טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> [is] unclean ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לָכֶ֑ם לֹ֖א <WH3808> not יֵאָכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> unto you they shall not be eaten
כָּל־ <WH3605> any ע֥וֹף <WH5775> fowls טָה֖וֹר <WH2889> [But of] all clean תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> ye may eat

לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תֹאכְל֣וּ <WH398> Ye shall not eat כָל־ <WH3605> anything נְ֠בֵלָה <WH5038> [of] any thing that dieth of itself לַגֵּ֨ר <WH1616> it unto the stranger אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֜יךָ <WH8179> that [is] in thy gates תִּתְּנֶ֣נָּה <WH5414> thou shalt give וַאֲכָלָ֗הּ <WH398> that he may eat א֤וֹ <WH176> or מָכֹר֙ <WH4376> it or thou mayest sell לְנָכְרִ֔י <WH5237> it unto an alien כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עַ֤ם <WH5971> people קָדוֹשׁ֙ <WH6918> for thou [art] an holy אַתָּ֔ה <WH859> you לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תְבַשֵּׁ֥ל <WH1310> Thou shalt not seethe גְּדִ֖י <WH1423> a kid בַּחֲלֵ֥ב <WH2461> milk אִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH517> in his mother's פ

עַשֵּׂ֣ר <WH6237> Thou shalt truly תְּעַשֵּׂ֔ר <WH6237> tithe אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all תְּבוּאַ֣ת <WH8393> all the increase זַרְעֶ֑ךָ <WH2233> of thy seed הַיֹּצֵ֥א <WH3318> bringeth forth הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> that the field שָׁנָ֥ה <WH8141> year שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> by year

וְאָכַלְתָּ֞ <WH398> And thou shalt eat לִפְנֵ֣י ׀ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God בַּמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he יִבְחַר֮ <WH977> which he shall choose לְשַׁכֵּ֣ן <WH7931> to place שְׁמ֣וֹ <WH8034> his name שָׁם֒ <WH8033> in it מַעְשַׂ֤ר <WH4643> there the tithe דְּגָֽנְךָ֙ <WH1715> of thy corn תִּֽירֹשְׁךָ֣ <WH8492> of thy wine וְיִצְהָרֶ֔ךָ <WH3323> and of thine oil וּבְכֹרֹ֥ת <WH1062> and the firstlings בְּקָרְךָ֖ <WH1241> of thy herds וְצֹאנֶ֑ךָ <WH6629> and of thy flocks לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> so תִּלְמַ֗ד <WH3925> that thou mayest learn לְיִרְאָ֛ה <WH3372> to fear אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> always

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> for thee so that יִרְבֶּ֨ה <WH7235> be too long מִמְּךָ֜ <WH4480> at הַדֶּ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> And if the way כִּ֣י <WH3588> since לֹ֣א <WH3808> you are not תוּכַל֮ <WH3201> thou art not able שְׂאֵתוֹ֒ <WH5375> to carry כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when יִרְחַ֤ק <WH7368> be too far מִמְּךָ֙ <WH4480> at הַמָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> it [or] if the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after יִבְחַר֙ <WH977> shall choose יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> from thee which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God לָשׂ֥וּם <WH7760> to set שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> in it כִּ֥י <WH3588> If יְבָרֶכְךָ֖ <WH1288> hath blessed יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> there when the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God

וְנָתַתָּ֖ה <WH5414> Then shalt thou turn בַּכָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> [it] into money וְצַרְתָּ֤ <WH6887> adversary הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> the money בְּיָ֣דְךָ֔ <WH3027> in thine hand וְהָֽלַכְתָּ֙ <WH1980> and shalt go אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> unto the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יִבְחַ֛ר <WH977> shall choose יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God בּֽוֹ׃

וְנָתַתָּ֣ה <WH5414> And thou shalt bestow הַכֶּ֡סֶף <WH3701> that money בְּכֹל֩ <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after תְּאַוֶּ֨ה <WH183> lusteth after נַפְשְׁךָ֜ <WH5315> for whatsoever thy soul בַּבָּקָ֣ר <WH1241> for oxen וּבַצֹּ֗אן <WH6629> or for sheep וּבַיַּ֙יִן֙ <WH3196> or for wine וּבַשֵּׁכָ֔ר <WH7941> or for strong drink וּבְכֹ֛ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after תִּֽשְׁאָלְךָ֖ <WH7592> desireth נַפְשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH5315> or for whatsoever thy soul וְאָכַ֣לְתָּ <WH398> and thou shalt eat שָּׁ֗ם <WH8033> and there לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> there before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֖ <WH8055> and thou shalt rejoice אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you וּבֵיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1004> thou and thine household

וְהַלֵּוִ֥י <WH3881> And the Levite אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֖יךָ <WH8179> that [is] within thy gates לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תַֽעַזְבֶ֑נּוּ <WH5800> thou shalt not forsake כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֥ין <WH369> has ל֛וֹ חֵ֥לֶק <WH2506> him for he hath no part וְנַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> nor inheritance עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> among ס

מִקְצֵ֣ה ׀ <WH7097> At the end שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> of three שָׁנִ֗ים <WH8141> years תּוֹצִיא֙ <WH3318> thou shalt bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַעְשַׂר֙ <WH4643> all the tithe תְּבוּאָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH8393> of thine increase בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> the same year הַהִ֑וא <WH1931> and shalt וְהִנַּחְתָּ֖ <WH3240> and shalt lay [it] up בִּשְׁעָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH8179> within thy gates

וּבָ֣א <WH935> shall come הַלֵּוִ֡י <WH3881> And the Levite כִּ֣י <WH3588> because אֵֽין־ <WH369> has לוֹ֩ חֵ֨לֶק <WH2506> (because he hath no part וְנַחֲלָ֜ה <WH5159> nor inheritance עִמָּ֗ךְ <WH5973> among וְ֠הַגֵּר <WH1616> with thee) and the stranger וְהַיָּת֤וֹם <WH3490> and the fatherless וְהָֽאַלְמָנָה֙ <WH490> and the widow אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <WH8179> which [are] within thy gates וְאָכְל֖וּ <WH398> and shall eat וְשָׂבֵ֑עוּ <WH7646> and be satisfied לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> order יְבָרֶכְךָ֙ <WH1288> may bless יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> thee in all the work יָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> of thine hand אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which תַּעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> which thou doest ס
